sentence.Network_en: But unlike his colleagues, Magni had armed himself with a real sword.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是马尼和他的同事们不同的是他佩戴的是一把真正的剑.

sentence.Network_en: They confiscated the weapon, but released Magni to await trial in freedom.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来警察将他释放,让他等候审判.

sentence.Network_en: Magni could be sentenced to up to three years in jail if found guilty.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果罪名成立的话,马尼将要面临三年的铁窗生活.
